titleStmt.title: The Rebels doom, or, An historical account of the most remarkable rebellions from Edward the Confessor's reign to His present Majesties happy restauration : with the fatal consequences that have always attended such disloyal violations of allegiance.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. for Robert Clavel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
